description.activeText: A communication problem exists with the agent to the DC-power system.
description.inactiveText: A communication problem exists with the agent to the DC-power system has cleared.

description.activeText: An alarm exists in the AC-input, e.g. ac input fuse blown, ac input breaker tripped or mains failure.
description.inactiveText: An alarm in the AC-input, e.g. ac input fuse blown, ac input breaker tripped or mains failure has cleared.

description.activeText: A rectifier, fan or temperature alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A rectifier, fan or temperature alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: An alarm of batteries, e.g. fuse blown, symmetry or temperature exists.
description.inactiveText: An alarm of batteries, e.g. fuse blown, symmetry or temperature has cleared.

description.activeText: An alarm of inverters, e.g. input fuse, fan exists.
description.inactiveText: An alarm of inverters, e.g. input fuse, fan has cleared.

description.activeText: An alarm of bypasses, e.g. switch-over blocked exists.
description.inactiveText: An alarm of bypasses, e.g. switch-over blocked has cleared.

description.activeText: The battery is in discharge mode.
description.inactiveText: The battery discharge mode alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: Low battery voltage alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: Low battery voltage alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: High busbar voltage alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: High busbar voltage alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: Battery temperature is abnormal.
description.inactiveText: Battery temperature is abnormal alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: A disconnected load alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A disconnected load alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: All rectifiers are off alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: All rectifiers are off alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: A loss of rectifier redundancy alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A loss of rectifier redundancy alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: An external fault exists. External faults are e.g. door open, smoke detector.
description.inactiveText: An external fault has cleared.

description.activeText: An auxiliary fault exists. Auxiliary faults are e.g. air condition, generator.
description.inactiveText: An auxiliary fault has cleared. Auxiliary faults are e.g. air condition, generator.

description.activeText: A battery fuse has tripped.
description.inactiveText: A battery fuse tripped alarm has cleared.

name.inactiveText: DC Load Fuse Tripped Alarm Cleared

description.activeText: A DC load fuse has tripped.
description.inactiveText: A DC load fuse has tripped alarm cleared.

description.activeText: System is in battery test mode.
description.inactiveText: Battery test mode has cleared.

description.activeText: The battery test has failed.
description.inactiveText: The battery test failure has cleared.

description.activeText: The system is in boost mode.
description.inactiveText: Boost mode has cleared.

description.activeText: A general alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A general alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: A non-urgent error exists.
description.inactiveText: A non-urgent error has cleared.

description.activeText: An urgent error exists.
description.inactiveText: An urgent error has cleared.

name.inactiveText: MCU Has No Satbus Contact Cleared

description.activeText: The MCU unit has no contact to the SATBUS.
description.inactiveText: The MCU unit has reestablished contact to the SATBUS.

description.activeText: The modem does not respond.
description.inactiveText: The modem does not respond alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: Low busbar voltage alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: Low busbar voltage alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: A dropped deep discharge contactor alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A dropped deep discharge contactor alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: A rectifier fan failed.
description.inactiveText: A rectifier fan failure has cleared.

description.activeText: A tripped load fuse alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A tripped load fuse alarm has cleared.

description.inactiveText: A tripped fuse alarm has cleared.

description.inactiveText: A tripped AC load fuse alarm has cleared.

description.inactiveText: A switched off load fuse alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: The fuse of a rectifier has tripped.
description.inactiveText: The tripped fuse of a rectifier has cleared.

description.activeText: A rectifier is off alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: A rectifier is off alarm has cleared.

description.inactiveText: A tripped surge voltage protection alarm has cleared.

description.activeText: The temperature is high alarm is active.
description.inactiveText: The temperature is high alarm has cleared.

description.inactiveText: An alarm has cleared in the batter symmetry monitoring.

description.activeText: An earth fault alarm exists.
description.inactiveText: An earth fault alarm has cleared.
